snippet: Obama shouldn’t open the Atlantic’s waters to oil and gas exploration.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Maryland Gov Martin O'Malley criticizes Obama administration's decision to allow oil and gas drilling along Atlantic Coast; cites dangers posed to communities and environment by oil spills; argues administration should be focusing on fostering renewable energy technologies, which would address issues of global warming, lack of sustainable jobs and long-term energy independence.
lead_paragraph: Obama shouldn’t open the Atlantic’s waters to oil and gas exploration.

headline.print_headline: Don’t Drill Along the East Coast
headline.main: Don’t Drill Along the East Coast
